amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-187 to direct HHS to measure the effect of training and credentialing in its evaluation to the public and recommendations to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Khanna amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Khanna.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Khanna amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
